creditline: Gift of the Kessler family in memory of Mr. and Mrs. John W. Kessler
inscription: Signature and Date. Inscription: [E30] (National Academy reference number located between the National Academy of Design emblem and the signature)
provenance:
National Academy of Design, New York, New York. [1] Mr. and Mrs. John W. Kessler, St. Paul, Minnesota; gift to MIA in 1975.

[1] The work was sold to benefit the Henry Ward Ranger Fund.
signed: LL: [H.W. Ranger 1909] (The signature is located under a triangle containing the initials [NAD] (National Academy of Design) overlaid with a cross piece containing the artist\'s last name.)
title: Landscape
